subSubSection.paragraph: Heptascelio hamatus is the most common species of the genus in Asia and is widespread from Thailand to Sulawesi and north to Taiwan. On mainland China it has been rarely collected and is known only from Hainan and Guangdong. Link to dynamic distribution map: http://hol.osu.edu/map-large.html?id=223416
